text: Maksim Tsyhalka (, , Maksim Tsygalko; often spelled Maxim Tsigalko; 27 May 1983 – 25 December 2020) was a Belarusian footballer. He made two appearances for the national team in 2003. From 2001 to 2005, he was known for playing for FC Dinamo Minsk. Tsyhalka died on 25 December 2020 at the age of 37.Умер футболист Максим Цыгалко. Ему было 37 лет ==References== Category:1983 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belarusian footballers
title: Maksim Tsyhalka
